summary: This mod adds Cannabis related content to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://111.imagebam.com/download/FJKt-1EXGwLkUSby7YkT0g/35229/352281139/2345988-1361292601.png[/img][/center]
[size=5][center]Since I've decided not to mod games anymore, I have released this under the [b][url=http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/]Creative Commons v4 license[/url][/b].
You can download the script sources at [url=https://github.com/danuttah/Cannabis-Skyrim]GitHub[/url], [b]read [/b]and [b]follow[/b] the license terms.

If you're looking for a Fallout 4 port of this mod, check out DOOM & Gambit77's
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/11840]Cannabis Commonwealth[/url].

[size=5]If you're looking for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4953/?]Skyrim SE version[/url] of this mod, fattyzhouse is the man.[/size][/center][/size][color=#5ea2e5][b]Disclaimer:[/b][/color]

It's not our intention to encourage anyone using drugs. This mod won't do harm as there are drugs already in Skyrim: Alcohol, Moon Sugar and Skooma.

If you're easily offended by this subject, may our guaranteed 'drug-free' [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30200/]Pipe Smoking[/url] mod would suit better?

[line]
[color=#5ea2e5][b]Description:[/b][/color]

Beware: This mod adds Cannabis related content.

You might know my Marijuana Plant mods for [url=http://fallout3.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16970]Fallout 3[/url] and [url=http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=38264]Fallout New Vegas[/url]. I have started to create Marijuana Plant for Skyrim but then Virakotxa joined me doing most of the great looking 3d models and textures you can see and he brings many new ideas in.

We found that our new mod deserves a complete new start: It's all about the herbs. So is it's name.

[line]
[color=#5ea2e5][b]Features:[/b][/color]

[list][*][size=2]Homegrown detailed, photorealistic and animated plants[/size]
[*][size=2]Optional handmade character smoking animations when using FNIS[/size]
[*][size=2]The Your Highness shop near the Whiterun Stables, lore and companion friendly and made of custom textures and unique objects you'll find nowhere else[/size]
[*][size=2]An animated Laboratory for fermenting elves ear, distil alcohol and to make Hashish as well as Hashish Oil [/size]
[*][size=2]Harvestable Marijuana plants which you can find outside the Your Highness[/size]
[*][size=2]Different Cannabis strains with different effects: Azura, Daedric Poison, Jarl Herer, Nord Lightning, Potema's Kush, Sour Divine - each of them with own textures. Each strain has its own benefits and caveats, just scroll down to the FAQ section for more details[/size]
[*][color=red][size=2]NEW in 0.1.6:[/size][/color][size=2] New plant Dragonborn's Ballsack (WIP)[/size]
[*][color=red][size=2]NEW in 0.1.6.2:[/size][/color][size=2] New plant Dovahrii (Dragon Juice) (WIP)[/size]
[*][size=2]Planters as well as Planting Soil, used to grow your Ganja plants wherever and whenever you want as many as you want - you can literally watch the grass growing - consisting of different homegrown models of the corresponding stage, strain or gender[/size]
[*][color=red][size=2]NEW in 0.1.6.2:[/size][/color][size=2] You can grow plants by sneaking and dropping seeds[/size]
[*][color=red][size=2]NEW in 0.1.6.2:[/size][/color][size=2] The Dovahrii Staff which spawns seeds, growing fields of weed was never so easy![/size]
[*][size=2]Pickable and animated female and male Indica, Sativa and hybrid plants consisting of different models and textures of every stage, strain or gender[/size]
[*][size=2]Edible Buds of all strains[/size]
[*][size=2]Edible Charras which you gather by harvesting female plants[/size]
[*][size=2]Edible Hashish and Hashish Oil (WIP)[/size]
[*][size=2]A craftable Weed Satchel used to fill bongs and pipes or to wrap yourself a blunt or roll a joint[/size]
[*][size=2]Craftable and usable bongs, pipes, joints and blunts, also usable by NPCs[/size]
[*][size=2]Smoking animations for the Joints, Blunts, Pipes and the Dragon Bong. You can see even the blaze's smoke and the actor exhaling fume![/size]
[*][size=2]Optional spells with which you can make other NPCs perform the smoking animations[/size]
[*][size=2]Crafting furniture like a spinning wheel and loom to craft hemp products like the farmer's clothes and the High Rock Robe[/size]
[*][size=2]Craftable Rugs[/size]
[*][size=2]The craftable unique High Rock Robe inspired by the 'Skyrim Drug Trip' machinima (video linked in the video section)[/size]
[*][color=red][size=2]NEW in 0.1.6:[/size][/color][size=2] A more immersive, NPC initiated selling system. Make nearby NPCs curious when you skome a Joint or a Blunt - never again "I might have something you're interested in..."[/size]
[*][color=red][size=2]NEW in 0.1.6.1:[/size][/color][size=2] An update routine so you never lose your stats and settings anymore when updating![/size]
[*][size=2]Decent visuals after consumption[/size]
[*][color=red][size=2]NEW in 0.1.6.2:[/size][/color][size=2] Indica and Sativa effects differ slightly [/size]
[*][size=2]An options menu to configure many of the mod's settings[/size]
[/list][line][color=#5ea2e5][b]
Fresh Installation:

[/b][/color][list][*][size=2]OPTIONAL: Install the Behavior part of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811]Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS[/url] if you intend to use the mod with FNIS[/size]
[*][size=2]Extract the files from the Cannabis Skyrim main file archive to your ...SkyrimData directory[/size]
[*][size=2]Check the downloads if an update is available and if so, download and extract the contents of the Cannabis Skyrim update file archive to your .../Skyrim/Data directory overwriting existing files[/size]
[*][size=2]OPTIONAL: Generate the FNIS behavior files with GenerateFNISforUsers.exe if you intend to use the mod with FNIS[/size]
[*][size=2]Start the Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, check the Cannabis.esp and CannabisUpdate.esp file[/size]
[*][size=2]Run the Game[/size]
[/list]
[color=#5ea2e5][b]Suggested Update Procedure (You will keep your settings and statistics):

[/b][/color][list][*][size=2]Start the Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files' and verify that both Cannabis.esp and CannabisUpdate.esp are checked[/size]
[*][size=2]Start the game and load a save[/size]
[*][size=2]Unwear all mod related equipment[/size]
[*][size=2]Harvest all plants and pick up the planters[/size]
[*][size=2]Leave the shop if you're in[/size]
[*][size=2]Use the uninstall feature in the Cannabis Skyrim Options[/size]
[*][size=2]Save and leave the game[/size]
[*][size=2]Start the Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', uncheck the Cannabis.esp file but keep the CannabisUpdate.esp ticked[/size]
[*][size=2]Start Skyrim and play at least three ingame days without the Cannabis.esp file enabled before you proceed with updating[/size]
[*][size=2]Save your game and exit. This is your clean save[/size]
[*][size=2]Extract the Cannabis Skyrim update file archive into your ...SkyrimData directory overwriting existing files[/size]
[*][size=2]OPTIONAL: Generate the FNIS behavior files with GenerateFNISforUsers.exe if you intend to use the mod with FNIS[/size]
[*][size=2]Start the Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, check the Cannabis.esp file and leave the CannabisUpdate.esp ticked as well[/size]
[*][size=2]Run the Game and load the save you just cleaned[/size]
[size=2]
[/size][/list][color=#5ea2e5][b]Partial Uninstall (You will keep your settings and statistics):

[/b][/color][list][*][size=2]Start the game and load a save[/size]
[*][size=2]Unwear all mod related equipment[/size]
[*][size=2]Harvest all plants and pick up the planters[/size]
[*][size=2]Leave the shop if you're in[/size]
[*][size=2]Use the uninstall feature in the Cannabis Skyrim Options[/size]
[*][size=2]Save and leave the game[/size]
[*][size=2]Start the Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', uncheck the Cannabis.esp file but keep the CannabisUpdate.esp ticked[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove folder .../Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/Animations/Cannabis[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove folder .../Data/Meshes/Cannabis[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove folder .../Data/Textures/Cannabis[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove folder .../Data/Sounds/FX/Cannabis[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove file .../Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/Behaviors/FNIS_Cannabis_Behavior.hkx[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove file .../Data/Cannabis.bsa[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove file .../Data/Cannabis.esp[/size]
[size=2]
[/size][/list][color=#5ea2e5][b]Complete Uninstall (You will lose your settings and statistics):

[/b][/color][list][*][size=2]Start the Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', uncheck the CannabisUpdate.esp file[/size]
[*][size=2]Start the game and load a save[/size]
[*][size=2]Unwear all mod related equipment[/size]
[*][size=2]Harvest all plants and pick up the planters[/size]
[*][size=2]Leave the shop if you're in[/size]
[*][size=2]Use the uninstall feature in the Cannabis Skyrim Options[/size]
[*][size=2]Save and leave the game[/size]
[*][size=2]Start the Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', uncheck the Cannabis.esp file[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove folder .../Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/Animations/Cannabis[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove folder .../Data/Meshes/Cannabis[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove folder .../Data/Textures/Cannabis[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove folder .../Data/Sounds/FX/CannabiS[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove file .../Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/Behaviors/FNIS_Cannabis_Behavior.hkx[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove file .../Data/Cannabis.bsa[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove file .../Data/Cannabis.esp[/size]
[*][size=2]Remove file .../Data/CannabisUpdate.esp[/size]
[/list][line][color=#5ea2e5][b]
Known Bugs/Issues/Limitations:

[/b][/color]You might need to (quick-) save and reload your game to make the selling dialogs work after first run.

[line][color=#5ea2e5][b]
FAQ:

[/b][/color]To maintain a readable page structure and reduce cluttering, the FAQ and History have been moved to an own thread in the [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showtopic=962434]Forums[/url].

[line][color=#5ea2e5][b]
Translations:

[/b][/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35918]Cannabis Skyrim French for version 0.1.6.2a[/url] by Lyimee
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23746]Cannabis Skyrim German for version 0.1.6.2a[/url] by Verodor

Many thanks to the translators!

[line][color=#5ea2e5][b]
Recommended/Related mods:


[/b][/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/822]SKYRIM ENHANCED SHADERS FX - ENB[/url] by Tapioks. You can find my personal modifications as a miscellaneous file in the downloads section
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting[/url] by JJC71[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268]
WATER - Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux[/url] by SparrowPrince[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22287]
Skyhighrim - Craftable drugs - alcohol - magic mushrooms[/url] by Ichibu

Hall Of Fame:[/b][/color]

author: MadNuttah and Virakotxa

files.name: SKYRIM ENHANCED SHADERS FX - ENB by Tapioks modified by MadNuttah
files.fileName: SKYRIM ENHANCED SHADERS FX - ENB by Tapioks modified by MadNuttah-8732-FX2-0Prev.7z

files.name: Cannabis Skyrim 0dot1dot6 Low-Res Texture Pack
files.changelogHtml:
Completely changed the selling system
If the player has the 'Green Thumb' Perk, the plants yield will double
The Laboratory needs a day to ferment elves ear
You can choose how many elves ear to ferment
Categorized and reorganized Cannabis Skyrim Options by adding more dynamic and better understandable menus
The animations can be disabled in the Cannabis Skyrim Options for those who don't want to use FNIS
The animating spells in your powers menu have been disabled initially and can be enabled manually in the Cannabis Skyrim Options
The animating spells won't work in combat situations anymore
Added uninstall routine to the Cannabis Skyrim Options which will clean up some stuff
The player will be forced into 1st person again after animated smoking
Fixed double Cannabis Options items and made it a quest object
Effects are now 'painless'
Fixed FNIS warning, thanks to honesty for reporting
Guide To Cannabis Skyrim Book fixed
Added a new plant model and textures - Dragonborn's Ballsack (WIP)
Added Bone Longpipe with own animations for male or female characters
"Fixing" items is not neccessary anymore
Fixed Empty Bottle refill - hopefully
Removed Display Case in the your highness due to extreme uglyness
Got finally rid of that nasty CannabisSatchelChestREF message in the log
Removed Aura Whisper effect
The new TES5Edit version showed some errors which I have removed, file looks clean
Fixed bugs, optimized and tweaked lots 'under the hood'

files.name: Cannabis Skyrim 0dot1dot6dot1
files.changelogHtml: Added a routine which keeps your stats and mod settings when updating (please follow the update instructions on the description page)

files.name: Cannabis Skyrim 0dot1dot6dot2a
files.changelogHtml: Luvarian has reported some problems in different menus, fixed
